entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Sunday 01 January 2023
